DOC.brief_summary: The intention study compare performance single-use I-gel laryngeal mask classic laryngeal mask 50 patient BMI > 25 elective surgery . Primary outcome leak pressure . Secondary outcome include ease duration insertion .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison I-gel Laryngeal Mask Classic Laryngeal Mask Patients With BMI > 25
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion criterion randomize cross-over study : BMI > 25 , elective surgery supine position , age > 18 year , ASA I-II ; Exclusion criterion : difficult airway , pregnancy , history reflux gastrointestinal disorder , abdominal thoracic surgery ; In cross-over trial airway device insert patient , order insertion randomize . Patient receive monitoring blood pressure , ECG pulse oxymetry operation . Anaesthesia induce intravenously use fentanyl ( 0.001 mg/kg ) propofol ( 3-5 mg/kg ) . The I-gel laryngeal mask insert gastric tube . The classic laryngeal mask cuff insertion cuff pressure 60 cmH2O . The first device remove 5 minute insertion replace second device . Ease insertion grade easy=1 , easy=2 , difficult=3 difficult=4 . Leak pressure measure two test : In first test spill valve close fresh gas flow 6l/min minimum airway pressure gas leak around airway device record listen audible leak . In second test leakage measure pressure control ventilation . Therefore administer fresh gas flow 3l/min , FiO2 50 % , inspiration expiration ratio 1:2 frequency breathe 12 . Leakage measure respirator . We record inspiration pressure , mean pressure , plateau pressure , tidal volume peep first measurable leakage occur . For statistical analysis use t-tests power 80 % p < 0.05 .
DOC.criteria: BMI > 25 , elective surgery supine position , age > 18 year , ASA III ; difficult airway , pregnancy , history reflux gastrointestinal disorder , abdominal thoracic surgery ;
